document_data.name: ''Staff of Nature's Wrath''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Staff of Nature's Wrath''''' was an enchanted [[staff]] created by a group of militant [[Silvanite]]s.
document_data.Powers: This enchanted druidic staff possessed a ''+1'' enchantment and allowed the wilder to cast the ''[[flame strike]]'' spell as well as ''[[entangle]]'' with {{SI|12'|'"|long=yes}} radius. The wielder was only restricted by their visa. range to cast the staff's spells.
document_data.History:
The ''Staff of Nature's Wrath'' was crafted by a militant group of [[druid]]s of Silvanus. The enchanted weapon was used to clobber the enemies of the forest, dispense nature's punishment, and protect the dignity of druidic orders. The main targets of the ''Staff of Nature's Wrath'', however, were the [[cleric]]s of [[Malar]] and his fellow [[Gods of Fury]].

By [[1281 DR]], the ''Staff of Nature's Wrath'' was in the hands of [[Arundel]], the archdruid of [[Kuldahar]] on the [[Spine of the World]]. Later that year, Arundel was slain by [[Belhifet]], and his enchanted staff was picked up by the heroes of [[Icewind Dale]].
